channel.title: W3C Web Application Security Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Application Security Working Group

item.title: [permissions] Typo â€• Duplication within enumeration
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Permissions/query

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Permissions/query#name

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

In the enumeration, camera is featured twice.

What did you expect to see?

Either remove one of the cameras, or replace it with another powerful feature name (e.g. microphone).

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

The same mistake is visible on the Chinese translation page.

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/permissions/query
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Permissions/query
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/permissions/query/index.md
  • Last commit: 3fde60e
